---------------------------]   0%'.PHP_EOL.
            '  20/200 [==>-------------------------]  10%'.PHP_EOL.
            '  40/200 [=====>----------------------]  20%'.PHP_EOL.
            '  60/200 [========>-------------------]  30%'.PHP_EOL.
            '  80/200 [===========>----------------]  40%'.PHP_EOL.
            ' 100/200 [==============>-------------]  50%'.PHP_EOL.
            ' 120/200 [================>-----------]  60%'.PHP_EOL.
            ' 140/200 [===================>--------]  70%'.PHP_EOL.
            ' 160/200 [======================>-----]  80%'.PHP_EOL.
            ' 180/200 [=========================>--]  90%'.PHP_EOL.
            ' 200/200 [============================] 100%',
            stream_get_contents($o
